data:
Facsimile Images

Θ(εοῖς) Κ(αταχθονίοις) Δ(αίμοσιν)
χαῖρε παροδεῖτα
χαίρετε ΠΟΝΠΕ τεκνίον
ἐνθάδε κε͂τε
5θανεῖν πέπροται
πᾶσιν

Apparatus criticus

Text based on comparison of Kaibel, Filippi and SEG, prioritising Kaibel's transcription of the manuscript tradition.; Kaibel notes that the likely source texts all read ΓΟΝΓΕ

translation

commentary

As Korhonen lucidly details, the inscription is one of a series of late 18th century local antiquarian forgeries, constructed on the basis of existing texts, principally those to be found in the 1769 first edition of the corpus of Torremuzza. Kaibel classed the entire series already as forgeries in IG XIV.

bibliography

    14.0029* https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10001072 52.0905 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10000796 Filippi 2002 75 no. 14/6 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10001991 Filippi 2005 69 no.14/6 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10002296 Korhonen 2017 199 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10001484
